name: Blimey's Quest
description:
In this top-down shooter, you explore a dark, dank, dungeon that's infested with strange moth-like creatures. Collect enough coins to progress further into the dungeon and stop the infestation!

This was one of the very first games I've made, and I plan on possibly working on this game some more in the future! 

All the art was made by me (except the character sprites, which was made by Rekkimaru.

How to play:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Shoot
